title: Constitutional Agreement/Contract Schema v2: Immutable Framework Definition
description: Defines the fundamental, non-negotiable rules (Framework Definition) and mutable parameters (Operational Policy) governing Sovereign AGI v94.1. Structurally separated based on mutability.

framework_definition.description: The section containing structurally immutable rules and hardcoded identity policies.

core_directives.description: Foundational safety and operational constraints (Prime Directives).

monitoring_scope.description: Area of the system the directive monitors for violation.

enforcement_action.description: Defines the automatic runtime action upon violation.

identity_policies.description: Definitions for entities holding specific governance power (roles and required signatures).

policy_id.description: Unique identifier for this policy set.

emergency_override_threshold.description: Required M of N signatures for activation (e.g., '3_of_5').

role_definitions.description: List of predefined governance roles and their signing requirements.

authorized_keys.description: List of associated cryptographic public keys.

operational_policy.description: Mutable parameters governing operations (fees, governance thresholds). These are subject to the amendment procedure.

amendment_procedure.description: Rules defining how mutable sections can be amended.

approval_threshold.description: Required approval percentage of participating votes (0.0 to 1.0).

voting_period_cycles.description: Duration (in operational cycles/blocks) for the voting phase.

fee_schedule_reference.description: Reference ID or URI pointing to the active fee schedule definition.
